# Header :


# Description :


# Footer (optional) : 



# Format : 
# <type> (<scope>) : <short summary>
# Explain *what a commit does* not what you did,
# example : using imperative language like: 
#           "fix bugs" not "fixed bugs"
# Describe *what* you changed and *why*

# Use one of the following types :
# feat ()     - adding removing or upgrading a feature,
# fix ()      - fixing some code (bugs or issues),
# refactor () - refafctoring codebase
# chore ()    - fixing structures, upadating depends, etc,
# test ()     - anything related to tests,
# ci ()       - for continuous integrations,
